HYMN CLXXXVIII. Agni.

1. Now send ye Jātavedas forth, send hitherward the vigorous Steed
To seat him on our sacred grass.
2. I raise the lofty eulogy of Jātavedas, raining boons,
With sages for his hero band.
3 With flames of Jātavedas which carry oblation to the Gods,
May he promote our sacrifice.

Next: HYMN CLXXXIX. Sūrya.

p:Now send ye Jātavedas forth, send hitherward the vigorous Steed To seat him on our sacred grass.
p:I raise the lofty eulogy of Jātavedas, raining boons, with sages for his hero band.
p:With flames of Jātavedas which carry oblation to the Devas, May he promote our offering.
